mapper.select: SELECT repast_barbecue.*,company.company_name,company.address,company.county_id,county.COUNTY_NAME FROM repast_barbecue LEFT JOIN company ON repast_barbecue.factoryid=company.com_id LEFT JOIN county ON company.county_id=county.COUNTY_ID where repast_barbecue.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
